metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46695 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Django 3.2 before 3.2.23, 4.1 before 4.1.13, and 4.2 before 4.2.7. The NFKC normalization is slow on Windows. As a consequence, django.contrib.auth.forms.UsernameField is subject to a potential DoS (denial of service) attack via certain inputs with a very large number of Unicode characters.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
